text: It was just last month that Grande professed her love for her dear friend. “ I love my big sis @ nickiminaj so f – kin much, ” she tweeted in May. But, their collaborations won ’ t stop with “ Bed. ” The ladies also have “ The Light Is Coming, ” which will be included on Grande ’ s fourth studio album, Sweetener.
